    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Starts the application.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments

      • addItem

        public static void addItem(String item,
                           String amount,
                           Object object)
        Asks item and amount for it from the user. Asks item and the amount for it and then adds it to given JsonArray.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to add to the JsonArray.
        amount - Amount for the item to add.
        object - Selected object from categoryBox.

      • updateShoppinglist

        public static void updateShoppinglist()
        Updates shoppinglist and its contents from JsonArrays.

      • start

        Starts the application and opens the window.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application

      • intializeArrays

        public void intializeArrays()
        Intializes JsonArrays.

      • generateJson

        public void generateJson()
        Checks if .json file already exists. If there is no .json file already, create one, if there is, gets contents from it.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Closes database connection when application shuts down.
        Overrides:
        stop in class javafx.application.Application
